name: free_resource
description: Clean free resource promo with large headline, website, and bottom image mockup. Ideal for promoting free guides, lead magnets, and downloadable resources on social media.

samples.headline: How to Grow Your Audience on Social Media

fieldPrompt.headline: Enter the main headline (use \n for line breaks if needed)
fieldPrompt.website: Enter the website or URL label (e.g., 'REALLYGREATSITE.COM')
fieldPrompt.image_url: Enter the URL for the resource image (16:9 recommended)
fieldPrompt.accent_primary_color: Enter the primary accent color (hex, used for the main headline)
fieldPrompt.accent_secondary_color: Enter the secondary accent color (hex, used for smaller text)
fieldPrompt.background_color: Enter the background color (hex, used for body and post background)
fieldPrompt.text_color: Enter the general text color (hex, used for default text)
fieldPrompt.resource_container_background: Enter the resource container background color (hex)
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the logo image URL (optional, leave empty to hide logo)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace or extend the default template structure

components.html_content:
${logo_html}
${small_heading}
${headline}
${website}
${custom_html}
